titleStmt.title: A newe ballade, declaryng the daungerons [sic] shootynge of the gunne at the courte to the tune of Sicke and sicke / [by] W.E.
titleStmt.author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted at London for Edward White, dwellyng at the little north-doore of Sanct Paules churche, at the signe of the Gunne,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
